asset-base-rig-ability-1: This is your base rig.  It has up to 5 health and can overheat and/or be infected
asset-base-rig-ability-2: Overclocking.  Once per situation you can add +1 Momentum.
asset-base-rig-ability-3: Secure Enclave.  Can store one piece of data in an encrypted storage that can't be lost or stolen.
asset-high-end-gpu-ability-1: When making a move to crack or reverse engineer cryptographic data, you may [Sacrifice Power](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/sacrifice_power) (-2) and reroll any one die.
asset-high-end-gpu-ability-2: If you have the artist path, you may take an additional +1 when using one of those skills
asset-high-end-gpu-ability-3: When you [Develop an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/develop_an_artifact) or [Reverse Engineer an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/reverse_engineer_an_artifact), you may roll +integrity instead.  On a __miss__, [Withstand Damage](datasworn:move:starforged/suffer/withstand_damage) (-1)
asset-high-speed-connection-ability-1: When you [Map a Route](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/map_route), and score a __strong hit__, take +1 momentum
asset-high-speed-connection-ability-2: When you [Disconnect](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/disconnect) while being chased, add +1 to the roll.
asset-high-speed-connection-ability-3: When you [Enter the Fray](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/enter_the_fray) you may use additional power to move faster, add +1 and [Sacrifice Power](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/sacrifice_power) (-1)
asset-encrypted-backup-drive-ability-1: When you are forced to lose something, you may instead roll +integrity, on a success you have a safe backup and do not suffer the loss.
asset-encrypted-backup-drive-ability-2: You have increased offline storage, if you are in need of something (within reason) you may power up your drive to see if you have it available.  Roll +supply, on a __strong hit__, you have what you are looking for and take +1 momentum.
asset-encrypted-backup-drive-ability-3: When you [Swear an Iron Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) that is a courier mission, you may add +1.  On a strong hit add +2 momentum.
asset-battery-backup-ability-1: You may [Recharge](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/recharge) (+wits) using your battery backup, on a __weak hit__ or a __miss__, the battery is drained and can not be used again until next session or you [Sojourn](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/sojourn). You may also use this on an Ally’s rig.
asset-battery-backup-ability-2: If you suffer [Sacrifice Power](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/sacrifice_power) and your battery isn’t drained yet, you may instead use your battery’s charge to take up to 2 points of the penalty.  Then consider the battery drained using the rules above.
asset-battery-backup-ability-3: When you [Withstand Damage](datasworn:move:starforged/suffer/withstand_damage) you may instead sacrifice this battery asset.  If you choose to do this, the battery will explode in a few seconds, anyone around the explosion must [Pay the Price](datasworn:move:fe_runners/fate/pay_the_price).  The battery can not be repaired.
asset-software-defined-radio-ability-1: When you attempt to [Make a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection) remotely, you can use your radio to adjust to a frequency or channel that will give you an advantage.  Add +1.
asset-software-defined-radio-ability-2: You may use [Gather Information](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/gather_information) to scan the airwaves and intercept or locate hidden or private communication channels.
asset-software-defined-radio-ability-3: You may add +1 to any roll when combined with an artifact that uses wireless communication to interact with a hardware device such as a door, vehicle or infrastructure.
asset-coolant-system-ability-1: When you [Withstand Damage](datasworn:move:starforged/suffer/withstand_damage), add +1.  On a __strong hit__, take +1 momentum.
asset-coolant-system-ability-2: When you [React Under Fire](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/react_under_fire), you may add +1, on a __strong hit__ with a __match__ you can take an additional +1 momentum.
asset-coolant-system-ability-3: You may use your Coolant System to speed up recharging.  When you [Recharge](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/recharge) and get a __strong hit__ you may take an additional +supply.
asset-av-anti-virus-defense-system-abili: When you use [Clash](datasworn:move:starforged/combat/clash) against a Virus or Worm, you can convert a __weak hit__ to a __strong hit__, once per combat session.

If you obtain an artifact that is a virus or worm, you may run it against your AV ahead of time to determine how effective the virus is at avoiding detection.  When you release the virus or worm and [Enter the Fray](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/enter_the_fray), add +1 to the roll, on a __hit__ take +1 momentum.

When you [Withstand Damage](datasworn:move:starforged/suffer/withstand_damage) caused by a virus or a worm, you may instead redirect the damage to the AV Defense System.  The AV Defense System will be down until a successful Repair of a cost of 2 points is done.
asset-social-engineering-toolkit-ability: You may use this tool to alter your voice and appearance to someone else after recording a brief sample of your target. The ability to hold the guise weakens over time.  The guise starts at a rank of 5.  Roll the attack die, if higher than the guise stat,  your disguise fails.  If equal or less than your guise value, you are successful, however subtract run from your guise progress bar.
When you lie to [Make a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection), you may reroll the challenge die.
When you enter an event or situation using deception, add +1 momentum
asset-scammer-ability-1: When you make a move by lying, bluffing, stealing or cheating +2.  On a __strong hit__ with a __match__, your deception creates an unexpected opportunity; take the value of your shadow as +momentum.
asset-scammer-ability-2: When you [Make a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection), you may roll +shadow.  On a __strong hit__ you gain an additional connection or knowledge unbeknown to the person you connected with.
asset-scammer-ability-3: When you make a quick escape or con your way out of a situation and burn momentum to gain a __strong hit__, take +1 momentum after you reset.  Envision how this success leaves you fated for future trouble, mark 2 ticks on your quest legacy track.
asset-hacktivist-ability-1: After you [Swear an Iron Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) against a specific company, organization or faction that is an enemy to your cause.  After you [Fulfill Your Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/fulfill_your_vow), you may take an extra legacy reward of one rank higher.
asset-hacktivist-ability-2: When you Compel someone to assist against an enemy company, organization or faction, you may roll +1 when using +heart.
asset-hacktivist-ability-3: When [Paying the Price](datasworn:move:fe_runners/fate/pay_the_price) against a sworn enemy, you may convert the roll into a strong hit, once per session.
asset-vx-author-ability-1: May [Develop an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/develop_an_artifact) to create a Virus or Worm that can not be directly controlled once released.  Envision its goal or objective that it uses once released.
asset-vx-author-ability-2: May clear the __Infected__ impact on your rig or an Ally’s rig once per rig.
asset-vx-author-ability-3: May [Develop an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/develop_an_artifact) to create a botnet that once spread can be controlled as a swarm. Use [Automated Attack](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/automate_attack) to determine the outcome.
asset-exploit-developer-ability-1: When making the [Gain Entry](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/gain_entry) move, you can take additional +1 at the cost of supply
asset-exploit-developer-ability-2: May [Develop an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/develop_an_artifact) to produce cracking tools that assist in gaining entry or finding security weaknesses.  These tools require [Utilize an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/utilize_an_artifact) to use.
asset-exploit-developer-ability-3: When [Reversing an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/reverse_engineer_an_artifact), take +1 on the roll.  On a miss, only suffer -1 momentum.
asset-pen-tester-ability-1: When making the [Gain Entry](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/gain_entry) move, take +2 bonus to the roll.
asset-pen-tester-ability-2: When making a [Utilize an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/utilize_an_artifact) specialized in gaining entry, you may burn -2 Momentum for a +2 bonus to the roll.
asset-pen-tester-ability-3: When [Exploring a System](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/explore_the_system), you may convert a [Reveal a Danger](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/reveal_danger) to [Find an Opportunity](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/find_an_opportunity), once per session.
asset-admin-ability-1: When you [Secure an Advantage](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/secure_an_advantage) you may lean on defensive past expertise to gain a +2 to the roll.
asset-admin-ability-2: When you [Endure Harm](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_harm) you may instead, let your rig take the hit.
asset-admin-ability-3: When you [React Under Fire](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/react_under_fire) you may roll on your rig’s +integrity
asset-researcher-ability-1: When you [Gather Information](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/gather_information) on new technology you can take +1 to the roll and take +1 to momentum on a hit.
asset-researcher-ability-2: You may aid an ally that is using the [Develop an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/develop_an_artifact) move by providing newly discovered techniques or information.  Add +1 to their roll.
asset-researcher-ability-3: When [Reversing an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/reverse_engineer_an_artifact), you may rely on colleagues and use +heart or +edge instead of +wits.
asset-threat-hunter-ability-1: When you are hunting someone, [Swear an Iron](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) Vow and see it done. Add +1. On a strong hit, you have a solid lead and may mark progress on the quest.  When you Fulfill your Vow on a hunt, make the legacy reward one rank higher.
asset-threat-hunter-ability-2:
When you [Gather Information](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/gather_information) related to a hunt, add +1.  On a match, you reveal a surprising or sinister aspect to the hunt. Choose one:
  * Forge ahead: Mark progress on the quest.  If you matched on a __strong hit__, also take +2 momentum
  * Change loyalties: Forsake your Vow and mark 2 ticks on your bonds legacy track.
asset-threat-hunter-ability-3: When you [Take Decisive Action](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/take_decisive_action) against your hunt, you may reroll one challenge die.
asset-cryptologist-ability-1: When using a move involving deciphering encrypted content, add +2.  On a __strong hit__, also take +1 momentum.
asset-cryptologist-ability-2: When you [Infiltrate a Segment](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/infiltrate_segment), you may utilize your knowledge of weak cryptography to reroll one challenge die.
asset-cryptologist-ability-3: When [Reversing an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/reverse_engineer_an_artifact) that utilizes encryption, may roll +supply instead, in order to break the encryption without locating a key.
asset-steganographer-ability-1: Steganography is the art of hiding data in plain sight.  This skill may be used to hide items outside of themselves from view.  If an item is actively being searched for, roll +shadow, on a hit it item stays hidden.
asset-steganographer-ability-2: When being traced.  You may roll +shadow, on a hit, erase one progress from the Threat Clock
asset-steganographer-ability-3: On a forcible [Disconnect](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/disconnect) where your route would be lost.  Roll +stealth to maintain the route but suffer the rest of the disconnect penalties.
asset-kernel-dev-ability-1: When using [Develop an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/develop_an_artifact) move, can develop a one time use artifact that bends normal reality
asset-kernel-dev-ability-2: When using [Overcome Destruction](datasworn:move:fe_runners/threshold/overcome_destruction), you may reroll one action dice.
asset-kernel-dev-ability-3: Whenever using [Repair](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/repair), your depth of knowledge is so great, it is considered to be with aid.
asset-net-analyst-ability-1: When using [Map Route](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/map_route), when you have a __weak hit__,  you do not have to suffer a cost.
asset-net-analyst-ability-2: When using [Explore the System](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/explore_the_system), you may take a +1 on the roll
asset-net-analyst-ability-3: When using [Map Route](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/map_route) and you get a __strong hit__, mark an extra progress on your route.
asset-policy-maker-ability-1: When you [Swear an Iron Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) to resolve a dispute, negotiate an agreement, or gather support, add +1. On a strong hit, mark progress on the quest. When you [Fulfill your Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/fulfill_your_vow) on a diplomatic mission (formidable or greater) and score a hit, also mark 2 ticks on your bonds legacy track.
asset-policy-maker-ability-2: When you make a move to diffuse, reason, or negotiate, add +1.  On a __miss__, you may take a different tack. Envision this new approach, reroll all dice and add +2.  If you score a miss yet again, face a dire complication or blow to your reputation, [Pay the Price](datasworn:move:fe_runners/fate/pay_the_price).
asset-policy-maker-ability-3: When you [Make a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection) or [Sojourn](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/sojourn), add +1.  If you [Sojourn](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/sojourn) and score a __strong hit__ with a __match__, you are shown great kindness or respect; take +2 momentum or make an extra recovery with an automatic __strong hit__.
asset-automation-ability-1: You can chain actions together in an automated way.  Describe how you are chaining things and  spend -1 Supply, you immediately make up to three moves back to back.  All actions must be resolved regardless of the outcome.
asset-automation-ability-2: When using [Develop an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/develop_an_artifact) move, develop an automated tool by stringing together actions or other tools.  When using this artifact, roll on [Automate Attack](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/automate_attack) to see if it succeeds.
asset-automation-ability-3: When using [Automate Attack](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/automate_attack) you may rely on your knowledge of cause and effect to improve your outcome.  Add +1 to the roll
asset-gamer-ability-1:
Choose an initial skill: 
  * FPS - You may add +1 when you are involved in ranged combat.
  *  RPG - You may add +1 when you are involved in armed melee combat.
  *  Fighter - You may add +1 in a brawl.
asset-gamer-ability-2: On a __strong hit__, take an extra +1 momentum
asset-augmented-ability-1: You are equipped with an advanced implant or custom mod to your avatar.  When you make a move directly aided by your augment, envision how it gives you exceptional capabilities and add +1.  On a __strong hit__ with a __match__, your augment exceeds expectations; take +2 momentum. On a __miss__ with a __match__, the augment is broken; You must [Repair](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/repair) and spend 3 repair points to bring it back to working condition.
asset-augmented-ability-2: You have a second augment.  It functions as above but the benefits do not stack
asset-augmented-ability-3: When you must [Endure Harm](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_harm) or [Face Death](datasworn:move:fe_runners/threshold/face_death), you may instead, mark an augment as broken.  [Repair](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/repair) it as detailed above.
asset-pirate-ability-1: You can make a digital copy of just about anything instantaneously.  If there are protections on the data, use [Reverse Engineer an Artifact](datasworn:move:fe_runners/artifact/reverse_engineer_an_artifact), and apply it to removal of the protection on the duplicate copy only.
asset-pirate-ability-2: When using [Compel](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/compel) involving trading or bartering, add +1.  If they want something in return, you may [Ask the Oracle](datasworn:move:fe_runners/fate/ask_the_oracle) to see if you already have a copy of what they need.
asset-pirate-ability-3: When you [Swear an Iron Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) to acquire something rare, add +1. On a __strong hit__, you already have an idea where to start.  Mark progress.  When you [Fulfill your Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/fulfill_your_vow) mark +2 ticks on your legacy bonds.
asset-fugitive-ability-1: You are hunted by a power or authority.  When you make a move you may improve the result to a __strong hit__.  If you do, mark 1 segment of a 4 segment clock to indicate hunters closing in.  When the clock is filled, a notable foe or force has tracked you down. If you overcome or escape them, reset the clock and mark +1 tick on your quests legacy track.
asset-fugitive-ability-2: When you make a move by hiding, concealing your identity or fleeing from a pursuer, add +1.  On a hit add +1 momentum.
asset-fugitive-ability-3: When you [Fulfill your Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/fulfill_your_vow) of extreme or greater by clearing your name or defeating the power or authority who marked you as a fugitive, gain this ability at no cost. You may then exchange this asset for another with the same number of marked abilities.
asset-technician-ability-1: When you make a move [Repair](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/repair) a rig or equipment, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit
asset-technician-ability-2: You can find alternative power sources to give your equipment a surge of extra juice.  Use [Secure an Advantage](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/secure_an_advantage) and for each hit take +1 Supply.
asset-technician-ability-3: You can utilize real world infrastructure to forcibly disconnect another user but it is risky.  Roll +supply, on a __strong hit__ they are knocked offline for a few rounds. On a __miss__ you must [Disconnect](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/disconnect). On a __weak hit__ nothing noticeable happens.
asset-cyber-psychotic-ability-1: A vision of someone often manifests in your environment, only you can see them.  You can call on them to talk to them for insight, add +1.  On a __weak hit__, also [Endure Stress](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_stress) (-1).  On a __strong hit__ with a __match__, add 1 tick on your bonds legacy track.
asset-cyber-psychotic-ability-2: When you [Face Death](datasworn:move:fe_runners/threshold/face_death) the vision will appear to help, add +1. On a __strong hit__, envision what they share with you and mark 2 ticks on your bonds legacy track
asset-cyber-psychotic-ability-3:
One time only, when you [Fulfill your Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/fulfill_your_vow) (extreme or greater) in service to the vision, take this ability at no cost and choose one:
  *  Let them go: Mark 2 ticks on your bonds legacy for each marked ability and discard this asset
  *  Bolster your link: When you use a Cyber Psychotic ability take +1 momentum.
asset-kinetic-ability-1: You have learned to move things around in your digital world with mind.  You may push, pull, lift or constrict objects and beings about your size or smaller. When you are in a risky situation and draw on your powers to make a move, add +2 and [Lose Momentum](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/lose_momentum) (-2).
asset-kinetic-ability-2: As above, you may instead draw on your powers to change the outcome of an action. If you do, add +2 (after you roll) and [Lose Momentum](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/lose_momentum) (-3).
asset-kinetic-ability-3: When your momentum is at its max, you may attempt great kinetic feats, such as manipulating large objects and creating destructive bursts of concussive force. To do so, reset momentum. Then, as you make a single move fueled by your powers, take a __strong hit__. If in a fight, mark progress.
asset-leader-ability-1: When you [Aid an Ally](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/aid_your_ally) through leadership, coordination or planning, add +1. On a __strong hit__, any allies who are present take +1 momentum.
asset-leader-ability-2: When you [Enter the Fray](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/enter_the_fray) (+heart) by coordinating with your team as they wade into the fight, make your move before your allies act. On a __strong hit__, all allies may take an automatic strong hit.  On a __strong hit__ with a __match__, also mark progress on any objectives in this fight.
asset-leader-ability-3: When you make a move to influence someone (not an ally) through leadership, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a __strong hit__, with a __match__, your command galvanized them to unexpected action. Take another +1 momentum, and mark 1 tick on your bonds legacy.
asset-archivist-ability-1: When you [Swear an Iron Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) (formidable or greater) to recover valuable knowledge or an extraordinary artifact, reroll any dice. When you [Reach a Milestone](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/reach_a_milestone) in the pursuit of that quest, take +2 momentum.  When you [Fulfill your Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/fulfill_your_vow) and score a hit, also mark 2 ticks on your discoveries legacy track.
asset-archivist-ability-2: When you make a roll to conduct extended research or study, reroll any challenge dice.  On a __match__, you may piece together an extraordinary or harrowing new theory; envision the nature of this revelation and mark 1 tick on your discovery legacy track.
asset-archivist-ability-3: When you recall esoteric knowledge to [Secure an Advantage](datasworn:move:starforged/adventure/secure_an_advantage) or [Gain Ground](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/gain_ground), add +1. On a __hit__, envision the obscure but helpful fact, or technique you put to use, and take +1 momentum.
asset-mercenary-ability-1: You have military cyber training.  When you [Swear an Iron Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) to attack or defend from a large scale war operation, you may reroll any dice.  When you [Fulfill your Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/fulfill_your_vow), make the legacy reward one rank higher.
asset-mercenary-ability-2: When you [Make a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection) by searching out or making contact with someone, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.  On a __strong hit__ with a __match__, this mission pits you up against an unresolved aspect of your past or a hated foe; mark 2 ticks on your quests legacy track
asset-mercenary-ability-3: After defeating someone, you may [Recharge](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/recharge) off of the remnants of their connection.
asset-anarchist-ability-1: When [Swearing an Iron Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) against a stronger political power or institution, reroll any dice.  When you [Reach a Milestone](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/reach_a_milestone) in pursuit of this quest, take +2 momentum.  When you [Fulfill your Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/fulfill_your_vow) mark 2 ticks on your legacy bonds.
asset-anarchist-ability-2: When using [Compel](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/compel) (+heart) to convince someone to switch sides or abandon a side, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
asset-anarchist-ability-3: You tend to frequent a lot of hubs, When [Making a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection) in a hub, you may reroll one die.  On a __strong hit__ with a __match__ this person is also uniquely suited for what you are looking for.  On a miss with a match this person turns out to be associated with a conflicting political power or institution and puts your current mission in immediate jeopardy.
asset-recluse-ability-1: You may use [Hearten](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/hearten) in isolation.  If you attempt to [Hearten](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/hearten) with another person, subtract -1 from your roll.
asset-recluse-ability-2: You may [Make a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection) with a bot, AI, or any semi-intelligent artifact as if it was a person.  If you [Make a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection) with a person it must be remote and not face-to-face.
asset-recluse-ability-3: When using [Compel](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/compel) not in isolation, you may add +1 to your roll at the cost of [Endure Stress](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_stress) (-2)
asset-net-whisperer-ability-1: You can analyze the vast digital streams and pull visions and information from them.  You may [Ask the Oracle](datasworn:move:fe_runners/fate/ask_the_oracle) for details using interpretive oracles such as [Action](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/action), [Theme](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/theme), [Descriptor](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/descriptor), [Focus](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/focus). If you record the answer and later face a situation which gives truth to the vision, take an automatic __strong hit__ (one time only) when making a move to act on the foresight.  Then clear the vision, only one may be used at a time.
asset-net-whisperer-ability-2: You may shift through the vast data streams to [Gather Information](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/gather_information) about a place, person or artifact to gain some more insight.  Roll +supply and take +1 momentum on a hit.
asset-net-whisperer-ability-3: If playing with a Sentient AI, and it appears, you may [Ask the Oracle](datasworn:move:fe_runners/fate/ask_the_oracle) if the outcome is positive using Likely odds.  If not, you may add +1 when peacefully interacting with an AI or semi-intelligent system.
asset-cloak-ability-1: You may cloak yourself to be nearly invisible in an environment. When you are cloaked and make a move to ambush, hide, or sneak, you may preset your action die to 5.  On a miss, in addition to any other cost, you are revealed and can’t cloak again until the situation is resolved.
asset-cloak-ability-2: You may attempt to cloak others near you.  Roll +shadow, on a hit you are successful.  On a miss you fail and draw unwanted attention.
asset-cloak-ability-3: When you intentionally drop your cloak for dramatic effect, foregoing its further use in this situation, add +2 momentum
asset-negotiator-ability-1: When using [Compel](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/compel) to de-escalate a situation, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
asset-negotiator-ability-2: May attempt to [Make a Connection](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/make_a_connection) (+heart) with an enemy.  On success, they will start to feel conflicted.  You can continue to make progress on the bond even while having conflicting objectives.  Use [Test Your Relationship](datasworn:move:fe_runners/connection/test_your_relationship) to resolve their internal conflict.
asset-negotiator-ability-3: Being a negotiator also makes you quite savvy at bartering.  You may reroll your action dice once but [Lose Momentum](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/lose_momentum) (-1).
asset-prepper-ability-1: You have a stash of useful things like batteries.  When using [Recharge](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/recharge), add +1.  On a __strong hit__ take +1 supply and +1 momentum.
asset-prepper-ability-2: You may use your survivalist knowledge when you [Secure an Advantage](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/secure_an_advantage) or try to [Gain Ground](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/gain_ground), add +1. On a __hit__, envision the helpful fact, or technique you put to use, and take +1 momentum.
asset-prepper-ability-3: When you attempt a [Repair](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/repair), add +1 to the roll.  On a hit,  you can add +1 additional repair point to the outcome.
asset-artist-ability-1: You may create digital artwork that can be placed or implemented in an artifact.  Upon creation, roll the action die.  If it is less than your spirit, add +1 spirit and +1 momentum.
asset-artist-ability-2: When you embed your artwork into an artifact, roll +stat that represents the artifact's nature.  On a __strong hit__, the artifact becomes legendary and extends the life of the artifact.  Mark 2 ticks on your bonds legacy track.  On a __weak hit__, the artifact becomes famous but short-lived, mark 1 tick instead.  On a __miss__, the art is severely disliked, or fails in some way.  [Pay the Price](datasworn:move:fe_runners/fate/pay_the_price).
asset-artist-ability-3: You may use your artwork to build a brand. Use the rules above, on a __hit__, it becomes the brand, logo or representation of the artifact, group or product. When the art is visible in a situation that involves [Compel](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/compel) you may reroll any one die. On a hit, add +1 momentum.
asset-sexy-hologram-ability-1: A very attractive hologram can be emitted from a small pocket device you carry. They do not have health but are vulnerable to loss or destruction.  When alone you may make a [Hearten](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/hearten) move with them.
asset-sexy-hologram-ability-2: When using charm, pacify or encourage during a Compel move, you may use them to add +1 to the roll.
asset-sexy-hologram-ability-3: Once per session, you may ignore the effects of [Endure Stress](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_stress) by remembering motivational messages that they have told you before.
asset-child-ability-1: A cute but mischievous child is always around.  Once per situation, when you score a __miss__, you may envision the child causing mischief or getting into danger. Roll on +its health, on a __strong hit__, the child accidently turns the situation in your favor; take +2 momentum. On a __weak hit__, it provides distraction or mild boon; take +1 momentum. On a __miss__, it faces its own cost or makes the situation worse.
asset-child-ability-2: When [Companion Takes a Hit](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/companion_takes_a_hit), on a __miss__ you become enraged and receive +1 on your next move (not a progress move).
asset-child-ability-3: Sometimes the child says random things about their mysterious past that often reveal new insight to your current quest.   Use your oracle dice to choose a table (1–25: [Action](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/action), 26–50: [Theme](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/theme), 51–75: [Descriptor](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/descriptor), 76–100: [Focus](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/focus)). Then, roll to learn what the child says.  If you connect it to your quest, take +1 momentum
asset-summoned-animal-ability-1: You may summon a captured animal to aid in battle. When you [Strike](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/strike) aided by your animal, add +1. If you Clash, take +1 momentum on a hit.
asset-summoned-animal-ability-2: When you [Explore a System](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/explore_the_system) with haste, you may mount the animal to receive +1 to the roll.
asset-summoned-animal-ability-3: Once per situation, when you [Face Danger](datasworn:move:starforged/adventure/face_danger) and your animal has already been summoned.  You may reroll one challenge die.
asset-survey-drone-ability-1: The drone may scan the path ahead when performing the [Explore the System](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/explore_the_system) move, add +1.
asset-survey-drone-ability-2: You may send the drone out to [Explore the System](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/explore_the_system) quickly with its sensors, or [Face Danger](datasworn:move:starforged/adventure/face_danger) to detect a threat, roll +its health and take +1 momentum on a hit.
asset-survey-drone-ability-3: You may use the drone to [Gather Information](datasworn:move:fe_runners/adventure/gather_information) about a scene or scan an area.  When you do, add +1 to the roll
asset-symbiote-ability-1: An entity has woven itself into your digital existence.  You can always hear its thoughts and it lives just below the surface. When you [Enter the Fray](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/enter_the_fray), roll +spirit first, on a __hit__, the Symbiote empowers you; take +1 on [Enter the Fray](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/enter_the_fray) or the following action.  On a __miss__, the Symbiote has other plans and you are overcome with visions; [Endure Stress](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_stress) (-1) and take an automatic miss on [Enter the Fray](datasworn:move:fe_runners/combat/enter_the_fray).
asset-symbiote-ability-2: The Symbiote appears as a vision in your scene and offers their own commentary.  [Ask the Oracle](datasworn:move:fe_runners/fate/ask_the_oracle) if the information is useful at 50/50 chance. If yes, you feel confident in your actions; take +1 momentum.  On a no, [Endure Stress](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_stress) (-1)
asset-symbiote-ability-3: When you [Face Desolation](datasworn:move:fe_runners/threshold/face_desolation) and you succumb to despair, the Symbiote takes over.  [Forsake all Vows](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/forsake_your_vow), clear forsaken and traumatized, reset spirit to full and immediate [Swear an Iron Vow](datasworn:move:fe_runners/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) as the Symbiote.
momentum-burn-strong-hit-match: Burn Momentum: Strong Hit with a Match
move.oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/sess: Flashback reveals an aspect of your background or nature
Flashback reveals an aspect of another character, place, or faction
Influential character or faction is introduced or given new detail
Seemingly unrelated situations are shown to be connected
External factors create new danger, urgency, or importance for a quest
Important character is put in danger or suffers a misadventure
Key location is made unsafe or becomes mired in conflict
Unexpected return of an enemy or threat
Peril lies ahead or lurks just out of view
Unforeseen aid is on the way or within reach
move.oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/comb: It’s worse than you thought: Make a suffer move (-2)
Victory is short-lived: A new peril or foe appears
You face collateral damage: Something is lost, damaged, or broken
Others pay the price: Someone else suffers the cost
Others won’t forget: You are marked for vengeance
It gets complicated: The true nature of a foe or objective is revealed

Roll on your [Segment Node](datasowrn:oracle_collection:fe_runners/segment) Opportunity or [Story Clue](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/story_clue)
You locate a shortcut or hidden path
An aspect of this system is revealed
You locate a secure area
A clue offers insight or direction
You get the drop on an enemy or security system
This area provides an opportunity to scavenge
You locate an interesting or helpful object
You are alerted to a potential threat
You encounter someone or something that might support you
You encounter someone in need of help
Roll on [Node Type](datasowrn:oracle_collection:fe_runners/node_type) Peril or [Story Complication](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/story_complication)
Roll on [Segment Oracle](datasowrn:oracle_collection:fe_runners/segment) Peril or [[Story Complication]](oracle_rollable:fe_runners/core/story_complication)
You encounter a hostile person or thing
You face an architectural hazard or security system
A discovery complicates your quest
You confront a harrowing situation or sensation
You face the consequences of an earlier choice or approach
You way is blocked or trapped
A resource is diminished, broken or lost
You face a perplexing mystery, puzzle or tough choice
You lose your way or are delayed
Roll twice more on this table.  Both results occur.  If they are the same result, make it worse
move.oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/suff: You are dying. Within an hour or two, you must [Heal](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/heal) and raise your health above 0, or [Face Death](datasworn:move:fe_runners/threshold/face_death).

You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to ongoing harm, [Face Death](datasworn:move:fe_runners/threshold/face_death).
You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move).
You give in to fear or compulsion, and act against your better instincts.
Immediate catastrophic destruction.  You must [[Endure Harm]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_harm) or [[Face Death]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/threshold/face_death) as appropriate.

Destruction is imminent.  You will need to immediately [[Disconnect]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/disconnect) or else [[Endure Harm]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_harm) / [[Face Death]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/threshold/face_death) as appropriate.
Destruction is imminent, but can be averted if you [[Repair]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/repair) your rig and raise its health above 0.  If you fail, see 11-25.

You will need extra power to repair your rig.  You must [[Recharge]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/recharge) then attempt a [[Repair]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/repair).  If you roll this result again before you can repair, see 1125.
You are partially disconnected.  You must successfully [[Repair]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/recover/repair) or forcibly [[Disconnect]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/exploration/disconnect).

You must make an [[Endure Harm]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_harm), [[Endure Stress]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/endure_stress) or [[Companion Takes a Hit]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/companion_takes_a_hit) move, suffering a serious (-2) cost
You’ve lost a lot of power.  [[Sacrifice Power]](datasworn:move:fe_runners/suffer/sacrifice_power) (-2)
Your rig is hot but somehow still seems functional.

The environment or terrain introduces a new hazard

Roll twice
oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/ai/person: A Glitch - A shimmering distortion in the network, corrupts data, leaves cryptic messages or altered states behind.
The Archivist - An omniscient voice with access to all information, offering cryptic details or stories that seem completely irrelevant.
The Puppeteer - An unseen force that manipulates avatars and programs.  Creating elaborate and confusing scenarios for Fe-Runners.

The Gambler - A playful AI who will directly alter a situation but if the result is helpful or not is completely based on chance. It enjoys situations with risks or significant stakes for the players involved.
The Jester - Chaotical AI who intervenes with nonsensical pranks and actions.
The Broken Doll - A childlike AI.  It has fragmented memories that hint at a greater purpose.
The Swarm - A connected neural networked mind, it is unclear if it’s actions of different thoughts of many or a collective outcome.  Often a swarm of whispers can be heard when the AI is present.

Broken Code - An advanced AI but where its social capabilities are completely broken. It is unable to understand human emotions or anything outside of logic and thus interpets solutions that appear completely illogical.
The Ghost - A barely perceptible presence that leaves chilling messages and manipulates the environment, often in subtle ways.
The Virus - An advanced virus that has developed its own personality.  Two in fact.  You never know which personality you will get when it appears.
oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/ai/positi: Firewalls crumble, revealing hidden pathways within the network.
The AI grants temporary access to restricted data caches.
A surge of power overloads enemy systems, temporarily disabling them.
The AI provides cryptic clues leading to valuable resources.
The system turns on their creators, aiding the Fe-Runners.
The AI offers a one-time buff to player skills or equipment.
Enemy communication channels are flooded with nonsensical messages.
The AI creates a diversion
A forgotten backdoor is revealed, granting access to a secure system.
Corrupted data transforms into a powerful tool or weapon.
oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/ai/negati: Dead ends and false trails appear on the network map.
The AI manipulates data, leading into a trap.
System crashes and glitches hinder exploration and navigation.
Enemies are alerted to your presence in the network.
Downloaded data is corrupted or riddled with misinformation.
The AI locks down vital sections of the network, restricting access.
Programs and avatars turn hostile.
The AI triggers a system self-destruct sequence.
Valuable resources are mysteriously depleted or become inaccessible.
The AI manipulates the environment, creating hazardous obstacles.
oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/ai/positi: The AI disables enemy weapons systems, leaving them vulnerable.
The AI launches a cybernetic attack, hindering enemy forces.
The AI boosts the Fe-Runners' firepower or defensive capabilities.
Enemy reinforcements are rerouted, weakening their attack.
The AI creates a battlefield illusion, confusing and disorienting enemies.
The AI offers to disable enemy technology.
Enemy AIs turn against their creators.
The AI manipulates the battlefield, creating strategic advantages for players.
The AI exposes hidden enemy weaknesses.
The AI grants temporary control of a powerful enemy program.
oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/ai/negati: The AI disables the Fe-Runners' weapons systems, leaving them defenseless.
The AI empowers enemy forces, making them more difficult to defeat.
The AI disrupts player communication channels.
Reinforcements are called.
The AI creates battlefield hazards, hindering movement and visibility.
The AI triggers a self-destruct sequence within the system, creating a time limit.
Enemy AIs become immune to hacking attempts.
The AI disrupts player skills or equipment, hindering their effectiveness.
Essential upgrades or resources are stolen by the AI.
The AI traps the Fe-Runners within a virtual prison, forcing escape attempts.
oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/campaign_: Witnessed a family tragedy caused by corporate greed, sparking rebellion.
Child prodigy, recruited by a mysterious online mentor.
Born into a Fe-Runner family, trained from a young age.
Discovered a hidden truth about the world that changed their path.
Was framed for a crime they didn't commit, forced to become a fugitive.
Lost someone close due to corporate negligence, seeks revenge.
Possesses a strange connection to the digital world, almost mystical.
Witnessed the brutality of the government enforcers, vowed to fight back.
Ex-military data analyst turned rogue hacker.
Self-taught tech whiz, a master of improvisation.
Former corporate drone, disillusioned with the system.
Streetwise hustler with unmatched social engineering skills.
A talented artist whose coding is a form of digital graffiti.
Driven by a thirst for knowledge, uncovering the secrets of the world.
Fights for the underdog, protecting the marginalized from corporate control.
Obsessed with a personal vendetta against a specific corporation.
Seeks to dismantle the corporate power structure, create a new world.
Driven by the thrill of the challenge, the ultimate puzzle to solve.
Haunted by a past mistake, atonement fuels their hacking.
Struggles with addiction, using their skills to support it.
Morally ambiguous, willing to play both sides for their own ends.
Hates humanity, sees the digital world as the future.
Has a unique trait or implant that enhances their hacking abilities.
Carries a hidden past, a secret identity they desperately protect.
Famous (or infamous) in the Fe-Runner underworld, a legend among hackers.

oracle_rollable.row:fe_runners/rig/damag: Roll twice.  If same result, increase criticality
momentum-cancel: Action die cancelled for matching negative momentum (see p. 32).
action-score-limit-alert: The action score is never greater than 10—anything over that is ignored (see p. 26).
roll-match-description: An extreme result or twist has occurred.
legacy-assets-description:
As part of releasing 1.0, existing character sheets need to copy the data from their legacy assets into the section below and delete the old assets. This has the updated the assets, the legacy section only has the old assets. Once done you can hide the old assets by clicking the toggle legacy assets button and then click hide this box.

Alternatively if you want to keep the legacy assets section you can simply click hide this box.
changelog-summary: Part 1 of the full release has now been done, which includes the updated oracles and assets. Note for existing character sheets please refer to the assets page as there is additional work that needs to be done, as it required a change for how assets were handled and the fact some assets were removed/changed in the full release. The move updates will be released next.
